CustomField.description: Set whether to credit for unused time when the billing cycle changes or if an item's quantity changes. If No, the anchor period will be free (similar to a trial) and no proration adjustments will be created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set whether to credit for unused time when the billing cycle changes or if an item's quantity changes. If No, the anchor period will be free (similar to a trial) and no proration adjustments will be created.
CustomField.label: Prorate
